name: 廖華彥
objective: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
本課程教材級數為歐洲共同語言分級架構之B1 (The level of the textbook is CEFR B1.) (GEPT Intermediate+ / TOEIC 550 / IELTS 4.5)

本課程為全英文教學, 學生在課程討論時需以英文發言 (This is an English-taught course. Students have to speak English during the class discussion.)

完整版授課大綱於學期初第一天課堂發放(The detailed syllabus is scheduled to be distributed in the first class of the semester.)

請注意：加退選期間, 若有出席其他教師課程的學生, 請記得向該堂教師索取上課出席證明 (If you attend other teachers' classes during the add-drop period, remember to ask proof of attendance from the teacher.)
scorePolicy:
以下為暫定評量標準, 詳細內容以課堂為準 (The following are temporary grading criteria. The final version will be announced in class.)

學校期中會考 (School Midterm Exam)：20%
班級期中考 (Class Midterm Exam)：20%
班級期末考 (Class Final Exam)：20%
報告 (Presentation)：10%
小考 (Quizzes)：15%
出席 (Attendance)：15%
materials: Keynote Intermediate - Paul Dummett/Helen Stephenson/Lewis Lansford, National Geographic Learning/Cengage Learning, 2016
